cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from xgboost import XGBClassifier

# 1. Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test  = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Keep PassengerId for submission
test_passenger_ids = test['PassengerId']

# 2. Combine for uniform feature engineering
full = pd.concat([train.drop(columns=['Survived']), test], axis=0, ignore_index=True)

# 3. Feature Engineering
def extract_title(name):
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    return title

full['Title'] = full['Name'].apply(extract_title)
# Simplify titles
title_replacements = {
    'Mlle':'Miss','Ms':'Miss','Mme':'Mrs','Lady':'Rare','Countess':'Rare',
    'Capt':'Rare','Col':'Rare','Don':'Rare','Dr':'Rare','Major':'Rare',
    'Rev':'Rare','Sir':'Rare','Jonkheer':'Rare','Dona':'Rare'
}
full['Title'] = full['Title'].replace(title_replacements)
rare_titles = [t for t in full['Title'].value_counts().index if full['Title'].value_counts()[t] < 10]
full['Title'] = full['Title'].replace(rare_titles, 'Rare')

# Family size
full['FamilySize'] = full['SibSp'] + full['Parch'] + 1
full['IsAlone'] = (full['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Fare missing -> median
full['Fare'].fillna(full['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
# Fare per person
full['FarePerPerson'] = full['Fare'] / full['FamilySize']

# Embarked missing -> mode
full['Embarked'].fillna(full['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

# Cabin letter
full['CabinLetter'] = full['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown').apply(lambda x: x[0])

# Ticket group size feature
ticket_counts = full['Ticket'].value_counts()
full['TicketGroupSize'] = full['Ticket'].map(ticket_counts)

# Age imputation: median by Title
full['Age'] = full.groupby('Title')['Age'].transform(lambda x: x.fillna(x.median()))
# Any remaining (if title all NaN) fill overall median
full['Age'].fillna(full['Age']
